name: Spin it or loose it
description:
You have a wheel.

You bet on a color from that wheel.

You spin the wheel.

You wether win or loose the money you bet.

Bot best on a color and spins dat wheel. 

GREY COLORED NUMBER IS YOUR MONEY!

BLUE COLORED NUMBER IS BOTS MONEY!

1. TYPE IN THE BET AMMOUNT

2. PRESS APPLY BUTTON NEXT TO INPUT

3. CHOOSE THE COLOR YOUR BETTING ON

4. SPIN THAT WHEEL  First one to loose all money looses  ENJOY!!
